checks.description: Verify navigation to Daily Wage Calculation settings page
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu > Payroll section > Daily Wage Calculation link
checks.assertion: Page should load with Daily Wage Calculation configuration interface

checks.description: Verify calculation basis options are available (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation basis radio buttons or dropdown selector
checks.assertion: All three calculation basis options should be selectable: calendar days, working days, custom days

checks.description: Verify salary components selection interface exists
checks.selector_hint: Salary components section with checkboxes or multi-select
checks.assertion: User should be able to select which salary components to include in daily wage calculation

checks.description: Verify UI acknowledges month length variations in calculation
checks.selector_hint: Help text, tooltips, or remarks about month-specific calculations
checks.assertion: UI should display or reference that calculations vary by month length (31, 30, 28/29 days)

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify navigation to End of Service eligibility configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure button/link
checks.assertion: Page should load with EOS configuration interface

checks.description: Verify salary component selection for leave encashment (Basic Only vs Basic + Allowances)
checks.selector_hint: Salary components radio buttons or dropdown in EOS section
checks.assertion: User should be able to select between Basic Only or Basic + Allowances options

checks.description: Verify calculation method options for leave encashment
checks.selector_hint: Calculation method selector (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.assertion: All three calculation methods should be available and selectable

checks.description: Verify ability to configure specific leave types for end-of-service
checks.selector_hint: Leave type configuration section with toggles or checkboxes
checks.assertion: User should be able to configure individual leave types for EOS calculations

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing which paid leave policies will be overwritten
checks.selector_hint: Warning message or indicator showing policy override status
checks.assertion: Super admin should see indication of which eligible paid leave-type policies will be overwritten

checks.description: Verify navigation to Daily wage calculation for proration settings
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > Daily wage calculation link
checks.assertion: Page should load with proration-relevant configuration options

checks.description: Verify calculation basis selection for proration (custom, calendar, working days)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation basis selector with three options
checks.assertion: User should be able to select calculation basis that affects prorated salary transactions

checks.description: Verify notice about impact on active unpaid amounts in payroll table
checks.selector_hint: Warning or informational message about changes affecting active amounts
checks.assertion: UI should display that changes will affect all active (unpaid) amounts in payroll table

checks.description: Verify warning when payroll month is open with existing prorated transactions
checks.selector_hint: Alert or warning message when attempting to save with open payroll month
checks.assertion: System should warn super admin that existing prorated salary transactions must be rejected before saving new settings

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave policy configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option
checks.assertion: Page should load with unpaid leave configuration interface

checks.description: Verify day calculation type options in leave policy
checks.selector_hint: Day calculation type selector (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.assertion: User should be able to select day calculation type for unpaid leave

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing payroll settings take precedence
checks.selector_hint: Greyed-out formula field, disabled state, or precedence messaging
checks.assertion: UI should indicate that payroll-side daily wage calculator overrides leave policy formula

checks.description: Verify formula display state when payroll override is active
checks.selector_hint: Formula field with greyed-out or disabled appearance
checks.assertion: Formula field should display greyed-out or disabled state when payroll override is in effect

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to leave policy configuration for override verification
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option
checks.assertion: Page should load with leave policy configuration interface

checks.description: Verify indication that global configuration overrides policy-level settings
checks.selector_hint: Override message, disabled fields, or precedence indicator
checks.assertion: UI should indicate that global unpaid leave daily rate configuration takes precedence over policy settings

checks.description: Verify policy-level customization state when global override exists
checks.selector_hint: Disabled or greyed-out policy-level configuration fields
checks.assertion: Policy-level customization fields should reflect disabled/limited state when global override is active

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify navigation to EOS configuration for proration verification
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure
checks.assertion: Page should load with EOS configuration interface

checks.description: Verify daily wage formula display in EOS configuration
checks.selector_hint: Formula display field or remarks section showing calculation method
checks.assertion: UI should display the configured daily wage formula (e.g., basic + allowances / 30)

checks.description: Verify decimal precision handling in EOS amount display
checks.selector_hint: Pro-rated amount field or calculation result display
checks.assertion: Pro-rated amounts should display with correct decimal precision without systematic undercalculation

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to leave salary calculation configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option
checks.assertion: Page should load with leave salary configuration interface

checks.description: Verify override indicator for leave salary calculation method
checks.selector_hint: Greyed-out fields, disabled controls, or precedence messaging
checks.assertion: UI should indicate that leave salary calculation is tied to policy configuration with potential override

checks.description: Verify display of daily rate divisor configuration (30, 31, 28/29 days)
checks.selector_hint: Divisor field or calculation basis selector
checks.assertion: UI should display or allow configuration of daily rate divisor based on month length or policy setting

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave configuration for remarks verification
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option
checks.assertion: Page should load with unpaid leave configuration interface

checks.description: Verify remarks field displays correct daily rate and day count
checks.selector_hint: Remarks section showing daily rate calculation and days used
checks.assertion: Remarks should display correct number of days for the month (accounting for February leap year variations)

checks.description: Verify calendar-aware day detection in remarks display
checks.selector_hint: Remarks field or calculation display
checks.assertion: System should dynamically adjust day count in remarks based on actual calendar days (28/29 for February, 30/31 for other months)

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave configuration for rate display verification
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option
checks.assertion: Page should load with unpaid leave configuration interface

checks.description: Verify daily rate is stored and displayed from leave occurrence month, not payroll processing month
checks.selector_hint: Daily rate display field or remarks section
checks.assertion: Daily rate should display the rate from the leave occurrence month, not recalculated from payroll processing month

checks.description: Verify consistent daily rate display across payroll cycles
checks.selector_hint: Daily rate field in remarks or calculation display
checks.assertion: Daily rate should remain consistent and not change based on different payroll processing months
